Our Projects

We work to a roadmap, which means we plan current and future workloads whilst also considering new project requests that are sent to us.

The projects on our roadmap are at different stages and we have varying degrees of involvement.

Most importantly, we look to support projects in a way that mean they are delivered successfully and meet our Digital Principles.

Here’s a snapshot of the projects on our roadmap.

Our 2024-25 Projects

Live projects

12

Investments Portal

In progress

To create a centralised system to manage investments.

Steff Berrow
Tara Rhoseyn
Paul Batcup

Infrastructure Upgrades

In progress

To achieve the accreditation of the information security standard.

Matt Kinnear

National Centre Booking System

In progress

To modernise the way Sport Wales operates the centre. This includes, but is not limited to managing and booking facilities, accommodation, catering for events and proving effective customer service to NGB's / Partners and external bodies.

Accommodation Booking System

In progress

To modernise the way Sport Wales operates the centre. This is a branched project focusing on accommodation booking.

Foundations Framework (Discovery)

In Discovery

Discovery into the need for an audit / reflection tool to coincide with the foundations framework

Paul Batcup
Steff Berrow

Data and Insight Project

In progress

To develop a Microsoft Azure data lake to house multiple data sets from various sources. Using PowerBI, effective and interactive reports and dashboards will allow data led decisions in Sport Wales.

Anselm Powell
Phil Stephens
Mathew James

Athlete Experience Portal Project

User research phase

This project is to create a digital space for athlete’s voices to be expressed, heard, and listened to.

Integrated Impact Assessments

User research phase

To support the Integrated Impact Assessment process so that all staff are able to complete assessments.

Citbag

Live

Citbag is an online learning hub to help give young people the skills, confidence, and sporting experiences for a lifelong enjoyment of sport.

Partner Investment Process (Solutions Phase 1)

In progress

A resource that enables partner investment to be managed in one place.

Owain Morris

User Research Programme of Work

In progress

To commission and undertake a programme of user research within three areas: Centre booking, accommodation booking, and main website.

Paul Batcup

Embedding Sustainability Into Procurement

In progress

Exploring how we can embed sustainability into our procurement practices.

Owain Morris
